00011 #include "McDiagnosticFactory.h" // Class header

00013 #include "McEnergyOutput.h"
00014 #include "McEnergyAverage.h"
00015 #include "McPairEnergyAverage.h"
00016 #include "McExternalEnergyAverage.h"
00017 #include "McBondEnergyAverage.h"
00018 #include "McPressureAverage.h"
00019 #include "McStressAutoCorr.h"
00020 #include "McIntraBondStressAutoCorr.h"
00021 #include "McIntraBondTensorAutoCorr.h"
00022 #include "McWriteRestart.h"
00023 
00024 #include <mcMd/diagnostics/mutable/TypeDistribution.h>
00025 #include <mcMd/diagnostics/mutable/SemiGrandDistribution.h>
00026 
00027 namespace McMd
00028 {
00029 
00030    using namespace Util;
00031 
00032    /*
00033    * Constructor.
00034    */
00035    McDiagnosticFactory::McDiagnosticFactory(McSimulation& simulation, 
00036                                             McSystem& system)
00037     : systemFactory_(simulation, system),
00038       simulationPtr_(&simulation),
00039       systemPtr_(&system)
00040    {}
00041 
00042    /* 
00043    * Return a pointer to a instance of Diagnostic subclass className.
00044    */
00045    Diagnostic* McDiagnosticFactory::factory(const std::string &className) const
00046    {
00047       Diagnostic* ptr = 0;
00048 
00049       // Try subfactories first (if any) 
00050       ptr = trySubfactories(className);
00051       if (ptr) return ptr;
00052 
00053       if (className == "McEnergyOutput") {
00054          ptr = new McEnergyOutput(system());
00055       } else
00056       #ifndef INTER_NOPAIR
00057       if (className == "McPairEnergyAverage") {
00058          ptr = new McPairEnergyAverage(system());
00059       } else
00060       #endif
00061       if (className == "McBondEnergyAverage") {
00062          ptr = new McBondEnergyAverage(system());
00063       } else
00064       #ifdef INTER_EXTERNAL
00065       if (className == "McExternalEnergyAverage") {
00066          ptr = new McExternalEnergyAverage(system());
00067       } else
00068       #endif
00069       if (className == "McEnergyAverage") {
00070          ptr = new McEnergyAverage(system());
00071       } else
00072       if (className == "McPressureAverage") {
00073          ptr = new McPressureAverage(system());
00074       } else
00075       if (className == "McStressAutoCorr") {
00076          ptr = new McStressAutoCorr(system());
00077       } else
00078       if (className == "McIntraBondStressAutoCorr") {
00079          ptr = new McIntraBondStressAutoCorr(system());
00080       } else
00081       if (className == "McIntraBondTensorAutoCorr") {
00082          ptr = new McIntraBondTensorAutoCorr(system());
00083       } else
00084       if (className == "TypeDistribution") {
00085          ptr = new TypeDistribution(system());
00086       } else 
00087       if (className == "SemiGrandDistribution") {
00088          ptr = new SemiGrandDistribution(system());
00089       } else
00090       if (className == "McWriteRestart") {
00091          ptr = new McWriteRestart(simulation());
00092       } 
00093 
00094       // If none of the above are matched, try SystemDiagnosticFactory
00095       if (!ptr) {
00096          ptr = systemFactory_.factory(className);
00097       }
00098 
00099       return ptr;
00100    }
00101 
00102 }
00103 
00104 #endif
